{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3144894,"name":null,"username":"Chuck117","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/b4bc9f/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-13T21:05:27.596Z","cooked":"

My team was practically stalking the time for the Limelight 3 to return to stock, which was literally 5 minutes ago, we had set up an account and everything to get the order in ASAP but it was literally gone in 10 seconds. Limelights are not PS5s last I checked this is absurd.

Introducing Limelight 3 General Forum
Todayâ€™s batch is gone, but will be more this week. Manufacturing bottlenecks are slowly clearing up. We are through less than 25% of our inventory for this batch.

Also note that unlike certain other suppliers, LL expects more in shortly.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2023-02-13T21:08:45.378Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":642,"readers_count":641,"score":163.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":426706,"topic_slug":"limelight-3-0-selling-out-in-10-seconds","display_username":"EricH","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/introducing-limelight-3/421087/198","internal":true,"reflection":false,"title":"Introducing Limelight 3","clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":4212,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"#westandwithUkraine"},"post_url":"/t/limelight-3-0-selling-out-in-10-seconds/426706/3","custom_user_title":"#westandwithUkraine","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3144902,"name":"Brandon_Hjelstrom","username":"Brandon_Hjelstrom","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/6a8cbe/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-13T21:09:01.470Z","cooked":"

Future releases will be larger than this one. We have a ton of units left and manufacturing bottlenecks are clearing up. Weâ€™ve been stockpiling parts for over a year. A single weak link can slow everything down. I know this is extremely frustrating!
